doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 64 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 175[Air Date: 12/17/1985]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 64 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 175[Air Date: 12/17/1985]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Navy attempts to discharge eight men with positive HTLVIII antibody test results2.Georgetown University law students vote to oppose gay discrimination3. Canada's parliament considers gay military admittance4. United Sates Immigration and Naturalization Service grants permanent residence status to Santiago ReyesCOMMERCIAL: NGTF Fund for Human Dignity5. South America discovers new evidence, supports the AIDS co factor theory6. Right-winged Boston conservatives Conference7. Pittsburgh Gay Chorus changes name to Renaissance City Choir, founders worry about backlash and job securityCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp8. Sports, includes clips9. Healthline: Conversations with GMHC: Raymond Jacobs, Recreation Program Director and GMHC Founder, discusses AIDS crisis10. Closing credits11. Lou Maletta addresses public
The Right Stuff:1. Sybil BruncheonCOMMERCIAL: The Monster2. Sybil BruncheonCOMMERCIAL: AIDS hotline, New York AIDS Action3. Safety messageCOMMERCIAL: The Grande Gala-Gay, The Islanders' Club4. Current events/media/culture, includes Marc Christian clip5. Closing credits
